page.title: 15SERVICEMASTER
page.content: Mr and Mrs Sinclaire own the business in the Boston area and there is another business in Lincoln.They have been in the trade for{5}years now.They go as far as{Kings Lynn, {Bourne,Heckington,Sibsey and Wainfleet The hardest carpet to clean is a woollen carpet because you have to pin it down and put dryers underneath it or else it will shrink .Other carpets they hang up to dry with heaters.They like the job and they wouldn't swap it for another one. They like doing the job because when people are feeling down, because they have had a fire _or a flood we go and clean it up so it makes them happy.They clean carpets in offices,supermarkets,pubs and also night clubs.
